DOC.brief_summary: Previous study show omega-3 fatty acid pill intake beneficial effect vascular health overweight and/or hypertensive patient . However , lack study show effect everyday consumption omega-3 fatty acid enrich food ( pill ) lipid profile microvascular reactivity healthy population . This study aim determine effect omega-3 enrich chicken egg consumption microvascular reactivity lipid profile young healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Omega-3 Fatty Acids Enriched Food Microvascular Reactivity
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer oral contraceptive drug could affect endothelium hypertension coronary artery disease diabetes hyperlipidaemia renal impairment cerebrovascular peripheral artery disease
DOC.keyword: omega-3 fatty acid , microcirculation , laser Doppler flowmetry , lipid profile
